Description: Rim sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; exterior: dot and billet pattern at rim; below, dividing bands: from left, part of possible large vertical maeander; broken maeander between lines; squares filled with dotted squares.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 239, no. 195)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0114) (phase 2)
